Description: This template deploys three Windows instances with the SystemPrep bootstrapper to apply the DISA STIG and makes a two-node MSSQL AlwayOn Cluster with a witness - db_mssql_alwayson.compound

SetDnsSearchSuffixScriptUrl.default: Set Dns Search Suffix Script Url

MssqlNode1InstanceId.Description: Instance ID of the 1st MSSQL Node

MssqlNode1NetbiosName.Description: NetBIOS name of the 1st MSSQL Node

MssqlNode2InstanceId.Description: Instance ID of the 2nd MSSQL Node

MssqlNode2NetbiosName.Description: NetBIOS name of the 2nd MSSQL Node

MssqlWitnessInstanceId.Description: Instance ID of the Witness Node

MssqlWitnessNetbiosName.Description: NetBIOS name of the Witness Node

AmiId.Description: ID of the AMI to use for all instances

CarbonUrl.Description: URL to the Carbon PowerShell Module zip file

CfnEndpointUrl.Description: URL to the CloudFormation Endpoint. e.g. https://cloudformation.us-east-1.amazonaws.com

ClusterName.Description: NetBIOS name of the Windows Server Failover Cluster (up to 15 characters)

ConfigureSqlAlwaysOnScriptUrl.Description: URL to the SQL Server AlwaysOn Configuration Script

ConfigureWsfcScriptUrl.Description: URL to the WSFC Configuration Script

DnsServerIpAddresses.Description: (Optional) Sets static DNS Servers on EC2 instances; comma-delimited list of DNS Server IP addresses

DomainDnsName.Description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the forest root domain e.g. corp.example.com

DomainNetbiosName.Description: NetBIOS name of the domain (up to 15 characters) for users of earlier versions of Windows e.g. CORP

ExtraSecurityGroupId.Description: (Optional) An extra security group to apply to the instances -- template always creates security groups required for intra-cluster communication

InstallSqlScriptUrl.Description: URL to the SQL Server Install Script

InstallWsfcScriptUrl.Description: URL to the WSFC Install Script

InstanceRole.Description: IAM instance role to apply to the instance(s)

KeyPairName.Description: Public/private key pairs allow you to securely connect to your instance after it launches

MssqlInstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for the MSSQL servers

MssqlNode1NetbiosName.Description: NetBIOS name of the 1st MSSQL Node (up to 15 characters)

MssqlNode1PrivateIp.Description: Primary private IP for the 1st MSSQL Node

MssqlNode1PrivateIp2.Description: Secondary private IP for MSSQL cluster on 1st MSSQL Node

MssqlNode1PrivateIp3.Description: Third private IP for Availability Group Listener on 1st MSSQL Node

MssqlNode1SubnetId.Description: ID of the subnet for the first MSSQL node  (e.g., subnet-alee2akd)

MssqlNode2NetbiosName.Description: NetBIOS name of the 2nd MSSQL Node (up to 15 characters)

MssqlNode2PrivateIp.Description: Primary private IP for the 2nd MSSQL Node

MssqlNode2PrivateIp2.Description: Secondary private IP for MSSQL cluster on 2nd MSSQL Node

MssqlNode2PrivateIp3.Description: Third private IP for Availability Group Listener on 2nd MSSQL Node

MssqlNode2SubnetId.Description: ID of the subnet for the second MSSQL node (e.g., subnet-alelo21a)

NoPublicIp.Description: Controls whether to assign the instances a public IP. Recommended to leave at "true" _unless_ launching in a public subnet

NoReboot.Description: Controls whether to reboot the instance as the last step of cfn-init execution

PsToolsUrl.Description: URL to the PSTools zip file

SetDnsSearchSuffixScriptUrl.Description: URL to the DNS Search Suffix Script

SourcesSxsUrl.Description: URL to the sources/sxs zip file for the Windows Server version used by the AMI

SqlAdminGroup.Description: Name of the domain group that will have admin rights to the MSSQL database

SqlIsoUrl.Description: URL to the SQL Server ISO file

SqlProductKey.Description: (Optional) Specifies the product key for the edition of SQL Server. If this parameter is left blank, Evaluation is used.

SqlServiceAccount.Description: User name for the SQL Server Service Account. This Account is a Domain User.

SqlServiceAccountPassword.Description: Password for the SQL Service account.

SystemPrepAdminGroups.Description: Colon-separated list of domain groups that should have admin permissions on the EC2 instance

SystemPrepEnvironment.Description: Environment in which the instance is being deployed

SystemPrepOuPath.Description: DN of the OU to place the instance when joining a domain. If blank and "SystemPrepEnvironment" enforces a domain join, the instance will be placed in a default container. Leave blank if not joining a domain, or if "SystemPrepEnvironment" is "$false"

ToggleCfnInitUpdate.Description: A/B toggle that forces a change to instance metadata, triggering the cfn-init update sequence

WitnessInstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for the Witness server

WitnessNetbiosName.Description: NetBIOS name of the Witness server (up to 15 characters)

WitnessPrivateIp.Description: (Optional) Primary private IP for the Witness; leave blank to auto-select a free IP

WitnessSubnetId.Description: ID of the subnet for the Witness server (e.g., subnet-abcdefgh)

Properties.GroupDescription: Enable SQL Client Connections from instances inside the VPC
Enable WSFC and SQL AlwaysOn Availability Group communications
